title.rendered: The Marauder Eats Bombs for Breakfast

content.rendered:
South Africa is home of the Marauder. You might have seen it before in an episode of Top Gear.

The Marauder is a massive, nearly indestructible off-road monster that the South African government will only sell to sovereign nations. In this video, you will witness its resilience as it drives away after a direct bomb hit…truly heavy duty!

title.rendered: The “Hell Kitty” Hits London and Turns Heads

content.rendered:
London is covered in supercar sightings every day. They’re especially prevalent in a ritzy area called Knightsbridge. That’s where most of the Ferraris and Bentleys go to play. So how would they react to seeing a current U.S. favorite, Dodge’s Challenger Hellcat, show up on the streets?

They react pretty damn well! Everyone’s turning heads and snapping pics. Can you blame them?

title.rendered: We Can’t Believe the Driver Survived

content.rendered: From Belgium comes this incredibly brutal footage of a car trying to cross lanes and making a near-fatal mistake. We see this small car maneuver around some trucks and ends up crashing into one parked on the shoulder. Then, the car is crushed from behind by another truck. It’s a horrific wreck but it turns out that the woman driving survived! She came out of the wreck with some broken vertebra and was in a coma, but she recovered and is doing well!

title.rendered: Genius Pulls Gun While IN a Police Car!

content.rendered: Police responded to a call where a man appeared to be heavily intoxicated. Instead of throwing him in the drunk tank for public drunkenness, the officers decided to do the guy a solid and simply drive him home. Before they get in the car they pat him down and find more liquor. They confiscate that but still agree to give him a ride. It’s during the ride home that the police hear a metal “CLANK” behind them. They stop the car and find the man has a loaded .38 he somehow got past them! They subdue the man without any shots fired and wind up taking him to jail instead of home. What an Idiot!

title.rendered: Man With Stroller Keys Aston Martin

content.rendered: The police in Hackney, London are on the lookout for this “Father of the Year” nominee. The dashcam catches him walking up behind this Aston Martin, baby in tow. He looks around before pulling out his keys and scratching the car! Local news in London says he caused £9,000 worth of damage.

title.rendered: Heroic Batman Impersonator Dies After Tragic Accident

content.rendered:
Lenny Robinson was a hero who dressed up as Batman to visit local Baltimore hospitals. He always rode in a black Lamborghini Gallardo made to resemble the iconic Batmobile. Sadly, he was killed this past weekend off Interstate-70 in Maryland.

Lenny was on his way home from a car show in West Virginia when he had to stop “partially in the fast lane” after encountering some engine trouble. While he was looking over his engine, a Toyota Camry side swiped his car, pushing it into him. When paramedics arrived at the scene he was pronounced dead.

Robinson was an internet sensation a few year back when dash cam footage of him being pulled over went viral. It was then that the world found out about his true intentions: his love of helping sick children meet one of their heroes and the joy it brought their families.

Our best thoughts and prayers go out to this caped crusader and his family. Rest in peace Batman.

title.rendered: Mercedes has Built the Truck of the Future

content.rendered: Check out this video showcasing some of the capabilities of the semi-autonomous semi truck! It’s designed to partially drive itself as it can navigate traffic and roads with great ease so the driver is able to take his eyes of the road and even rest if they’re been working for several consecutive hours!

category.description: Random, sometimes shocking, and usually for the lulz

content.rendered: Ever seen that iconic image of a snake that wraps around to eat itself? It’s called ouroboros and this re-creation of that with this train set will blow you away with how hypnotic it is!

excerpt.rendered: Ever seen that iconic image of a snake that wraps around to eat itself? It’s called ouroboros and this re-creation of that with this train set will blow you away with how hypnotic it is!

category.name: Grab Bag
category.description: Random, sometimes shocking, and usually for the lulz

content.rendered: This guy must have never towed anything before in his entire life! A Dodge needed a nudge off a hump so this idiot ties the truck to his front bumper and throws it in reverse. He manages to rip his entire front bumper off! Way to go!

excerpt.rendered: This guy must have never towed anything before in his entire life! A Dodge needed a nudge off a hump so this idiot ties the truck to his front bumper and throws it in reverse. He manages to rip his entire front bumper off! Way to go!

_yoast_wpseo_opengraph-description: This guy must have never towed anything before in his entire life! A Dodge needed a nudge off a hump so this idiot ties the truck to his front bumper and throws it in reverse. He not only fails to help the Dodge, but manages to rip his entire front bumper off! Way to go!

A Dodge needed a nudge off a hump so this idiot ties the truck to his front bumper and throws it in reverse. He not only fails to help the Dodge, but manages to rip his entire front bumper off! Way to go!
